body:
This PR updates the vtk package to use new variable names and adds some
external dependencies.

- add version 1.4.2 to gl2ps package. This is needed to use gl2ps as a
  dependency.
- new package: utf8. This can now be sued as a dependency for version 9.
- use the package provided FindHDF5.cmake for versions up to 8. Version
  9 already uses an internal version.
- adjust the hdf dependencies to match the ~mpi and +mpi variants
- add external dependencies when possible
    - pugixml
    - libogg
    - libtheora
    - utf8
    - gl2ps
    - proj
- turn off configuring MPI if ~mpi
- use new variables for version 9
- remove unused variables depending on version
title: vtk: update package using changed variable names
